vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σουδάριον, τό,
= Latin sudārium, towel, napkin, [NT+2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: a handkerchief, napkin, piece of cloth, burial cloth, handkerchief; Lk. 19:20; Jn. 11:44; 20:7; Acts 19:12*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: pañuelo ; lienzo, sudario (utilizado para los muertos)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 面巾 (等同於我們的手帕)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 面巾 (等同于我们的手帕)
